body_html: Just chiming in here. It's counter-productive to claim your wheels are manylinux1-compliant when they aren't. This is producing annoyances for other projects in the ecosystem who have to deal with bug reports such as "pyarrow crashes when I try to use it alongside tensorflow".
body_text: Just chiming in here. It's counter-productive to claim your wheels are manylinux1-compliant when they aren't. This is producing annoyances for other projects in the ecosystem who have to deal with bug reports such as "pyarrow crashes when I try to use it alongside tensorflow".
body: Just chiming in here. It's counter-productive to claim your wheels are manylinux1-compliant when they aren't. This is producing annoyances for other projects in the ecosystem who have to deal with bug reports such as "pyarrow crashes when I try to use it alongside tensorflow".
